page.title: 13Sea Water Distillation Plant
page.content: The distillation plant run by the{ {Jersey New Waterworks Company}at Corbiere was built in order to provide additional drinking water in times of high demand or extreme drought. The plant distils water from the sea by using a 47 "multi-flash" process at a{purity level}of{50 parts per million for drinking water. Sulphuric acid is used in the scale control. It's special feature is that it is a completely self contained installation which includes the steam raising and electrical generatng equipment.
